title: Deep Gnome
content:
eep Gnome Traits:

Superior Darkvision: This creature can see in the dark within 24m. Stone Camouflage: You have advantage on Stealth checks.

Base Racial Speed Gnome Cunning: You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws.

Deep Gnome Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Gnome race used to feature +2 Intelligence and +1 Dexterity. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. ??
